core_roles.description: The entity performing the pickup action.
core_roles.example: The robot picks up the box.
The robot picks up the box.

core_roles.description: The tool or device used to assist in picking up the object.
core_roles.example: The robot picks up the box using a gripper.

peripheral_roles.description: The location where the object is picked up from.
peripheral_roles.example: The robot picks up the box from the table.

peripheral_roles.description: The intended location or purpose after the object is picked up.
peripheral_roles.example: The robot picks up the box to place it on the shelf.

peripheral_roles.description: The way in which the pickup action is performed.
peripheral_roles.example: The robot carefully picks up the fragile vase.

peripheral_roles.description: The time when the pickup action occurs.
peripheral_roles.example: The robot picks up the box in the morning.

peripheral_roles.description: The location where the pickup action occurs.
peripheral_roles.example: The robot picks up the box in the warehouse.

additional_roles.description: The reason or motivation for the pickup action.
additional_roles.example: The robot picks up the box to fulfill an order.

additional_roles.description: The extent or degree of the pickup action.
additional_roles.example: The robot picks up half of the stack of plates.

additional_roles.description: A secondary entity assisting in the pickup action.
additional_roles.example: The worker and the robot pick up the heavy box together.
